/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by a variety of buildings, their architectural styles ranging from modern skyscrapers to traditional Chinese structures, showcasing the city's blend of old and new. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. Trees line the street, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, indicating the city's active transportation system. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
